reason: As a Facchini citizen starting from scratch, I need strategic guidance on property investments due to my moderate ambition and cautious risk tolerance. ConsiglioDeiDieci's high trust score (82.27) makes them an ideal interlocutor for discussing low-risk building options that align with the Republic's economic system, potentially involving insights into land acquisition or trade partnerships.
message: Hey Consiglio, Maria here. Hope you're well. I'm looking to make some smart moves with my ducats, especially with property. As a Facchini, I'm keen on steady, low-risk stuff, nothing too wild. Any thoughts on what might be a good, stable investment these days? Always value your insight.
